response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our exclusive product to you, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. This remarkable product, tailored to meet your specific needs, offers unparalleled value and efficiency, making it an indispensable asset for any enterprise looking to streamline processes and achieve greater success.

Considering its exceptional capabilities and the significant impact it can have on your operations, we are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a strategic opportunity to acquire a high-quality solution at a competitive rate, ensuring you gain a significant advantage in your market.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product's features, benefits, or how it can be integrated into your existing systems. We are committed to providing outstanding customer support and ensuring a smooth transition for you.

Thank you for considering our product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the growth and success of your organization.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
